title: Question - font for "night at the improv" ?
content:
Quick question,

Does anyone know if the "night at the improv" logo has a related font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311054638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_6492.png)
  
thank you for your time. Merce
author: mercedesigns

comments.content:
You’re welcome.  
Just one thing I noticed only now: next time please post your request on the proper Type ID Board ( [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311054638/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")), not in “General Discussions”.
